comment: He has a great attitude and knows his stuff. He gives good feedback and guides his students. He could be better at explaining things in class, but he is always available to help.

rating_tags: Participation matters--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Professor James is fine, but if you like a class with structure don't take him. He is unorganized and doesn't follow a schedule. He doesn't really try to make a connection with his students. He is very knowledgeable but is cocky and arrogant. He did not use follow-along tutorials to teach the Adobe programs, which I personally did not like.
Really great professor. Beginning of semester seems overwhelming but you ease into it as you go along. Great guy and professor. Take the class

A great class where you're pretty much guaranteed to pass if you turn in your assignments. He focuses far more on actual applicable skills in media production than giving useless quizzes or readings. I felt like I actually learned things that I can take away and use for many years after college. Also funny and very kind.
